profile:
Ontario Asbestos Removal is a hazardous materials contractor with a range of abatement services including asbestos, lead, mold and PCB removal.


Ontario Asbestos Removal management team and field personnel have extensive experience in the abatement of hazardous materials from residential to commercial and institutional as well as industrial facilities.


Ontario Asbestos Removal has the appropriate insurance and W.S.I.B coverage, the ability to provide bonding as well as has an excellent track record with the Ministry of Labour and the Ministry of the Environment.

 

Ontario Asbestos Removal utilizes the latest abatement techniques to assure the safe and timely completion of all projects. All our employees have been trained in the latest asbestos techniques and are compliant with W.H.I.M.S.

Ontario Asbestos Removal provide the installation or removal of manufactured products containing asbestos, including products such as vinyl or acoustic tiles, gaskets, seals, packing, friction products, or asbestos cement products and more.

Please call for free consultation and estimate for any project large or small.

Ontario Asbestos Removal guarantees 100% asbestos removal.That means that after we have performed asbestos removal, the air you breath is as clean as it can get.

Asbestos & Lead Removal:
Asbestos is a natural mineral which was commonly used in homes, buildings and school for various uses such as insulation, ceiling tiles, plaster, vinyl floor tiles, roof patching, etc.

Today, asbestos is no longer used as extensively since prolonged exposure to it has proved to be hazardous to ones health. When the asbestos fibers are released into the air anyone breathing the air is at risk. Asbestos exposure has been linked to lung scaring and cancer.
If you are unsure if products in your home or office contain asbestos you should have an Asbestos Certified Inspector inspect your home. If the product is protected and fibers are intact you can leave it as is. If the product has deteriorated it is essential to remove the asbestos from the premises.
